mapper.select: SELECT P.pro_id, P.name, I.img FROM product P LEFT JOIN IMGS I ON P.pro_id = I.pro_id WHERE ROWNUM <= 3
SELECT P.pro_id, P.name, I.img FROM product P LEFT JOIN IMGS I ON P.pro_id = I.pro_id JOIN basket B ON P.pro_id = B.pro_id WHERE B.id = #{id} AND ROWNUM <=3 GROUP BY P.pro_id, P.name, I.img
